name: fizz
content:
fizz verb [I]
(PRODUCE GAS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a liquid fizzes, it produces a lot of bubbles and makes a continuous s sound: I could hear the champagne fizz as he poured it into my glass.

fizz verb [I]
(SOUND)
to make a long sound like the s in "sing": Fireworks fizzed above the crowd.

fizz noun [U]
(GAS BUBBLES)
bubbles of gas in a liquid
ATU Images/Photographer's Choice/GettyImages
UK informal a fizzy drink, especially champagne: Who'd like some fizz?
